subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After an umpire’s mistake, Mike Aviles lined a single to center that started a three-run surge in the second inning to give the Red Sox the lead for good in a 7-4 win over the Tigers.
snippet: After an umpire’s mistake, Mike Aviles lined a single to center that started a three-run surge in the second inning to give the Red Sox the lead for good in a 7-4 win over the Tigers.
